publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3873 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2002 Amendment Order 2003-That the Finance Committee, in consideration of the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2002 Amendment Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*
